Articles.Content:
I remember back in the day there was a button in the VAB part categories called "Subassembly", it is not there anymore.

How do I make sub-assemblies in 1.0.2?

I am in career mode and I have upgraded the VAB completely, I am using Extraplanetary Launchpads and I noticed that when I build stuff in my orbital launchpad it lets me choose VAB, SPH OR Subassemblies

Edited May 26, 2015 by Mastikator
while you building, you will see a big "<-" in top left. click on it and will expand, now you can see sub assembly icon on it (one of the last, or the last one)
